bibl.title: The Triumph of Dionysos. Convivial Processions, from Antiquity to the Present Day.
bibl.note: See in part. pp. 10-13: II. The Egyptian Connection: Staging the Triumph [about the procession of Ptolemy II Philadelphos].
bibl.seg: John Boardman, The Triumph of Dionysos. Convivial Processions, from Antiquity to the Present Day.
Oxford, Archaeopress, 2014, 8°, ii-77 pp., 61 figg. n./bl. et coul. ISBN 978-1-905739-70-7. £20.
See in part. pp. 10-13: II. The Egyptian Connection: Staging the Triumph [about the procession of Ptolemy II Philadelphos].
C.R. par Laurence Cavalier, Histara < http://histara.sorbonne.fr/cr.php?cr=2335 >. - Stéphanie Wyler, BMCRev < http://bmcr.brynmawr.edu/2015/2015-06-14.html >.
